website_summaries.verdict: People are generally happy with the Salomon XA Pro 3D V8 GTX. This trail-optimized model is welcomed because it offers confident traction, a secure and waterproof wrap, and steady underfoot experience. On the other hand, the stiffness of the platform and the restrictive upper are criticized.
pros: The Quicklace™ fit-adjusting system allows for quick and effortless donning of the XA Pro 3D V8 GTX
This Salomon running shoe is welcomed because it has a waterproof upper that is efficient at staving off water infiltration
Several testers are claiming that the upper unit is able to protect the foot from trail debris and sharp objects
The grip given by the outsole unit is dependable and precise, according to most purchasers
Based on a handful of reviews, the midsole is able to support the foot sufficiently
cons: Some users have complained that the underfoot platform is a bit stiff for natural movement
A restrictive forefoot has been noticed by several consumers

customer_reviews.title: Brand, cost and longevity...
customer_reviews.text: I have had Solomon XA PRO 3D GTX for about 3 years now. They are comfortable, and unlike the speedcross the soles last the test of time. This new version appears to be better than the previous version.... I have high hopes:-)
customer_reviews.author: P. Barker

customer_reviews.title: High quality ptoduct
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a half size larger based on previous purchases. Very stylish and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Gordon, Tayside

customer_reviews.title: Great so far.
customer_reviews.text: Only had them for a week so obviously can't say how there going to last. But initial thoughts are very good. Build and construction seems of very good quality. I'm a size 9 and opted for a 9 & a1/2. As many seemed to suggest a size up. So I was a little apprehensive that they may be too tight. But they are actually a very good snug fit. I will update this. If I find any faults after a few months & miles in them. Currently very happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: Mark B.

customer_reviews.title: Good solid trainers, but wear out quickly
customer_reviews.text: These are a good solid pair of waterproof trainers. I have had several pairs now and my main complaint is that the sole wears really quite quickly, hence several pairs ! I do a lot of walking, all sorts of terrain, and a pair has yet to see a year without being replaced due to the sole grip wearing out. However they are comfortable for an all day hike. Not suitable for really heavy weather as they are just trainers, however will deal with most the UK throws at them.
customer_reviews.author: Mad Dad

customer_reviews.title: A fine shoe ruined
customer_reviews.text: A reliable product ruined. Variations of the XA Pro have been my go-to hiking shoe for nearly 20 years. I’ve owned many many pairs. Unfortunately, the V8 is a classic ruined. I’m not sure why, but they’ve made this shoe much narrower than previous versions - both sole and upper. Now it’s unwearable for me. Materials feel cheaper too and the sole less ‘grippy’. I still like the lacing system, hence one star. But it’s a very disappointing end of an era that means I’m in the market for a new shoe, and Salomon have lost a loyal customer who has spend £1,000s with them over the years.
customer_reviews.author: Happyclapper

customer_reviews.title: These always come up small, order at least 1 size bigger
customer_reviews.text: Fortunately having purchased this make before I knew they would come up small, they are also a narrow fit. I purchased a pair of these some 4 years ago and whilst I was keen to have another pair, these are disappointing in comparison. The elastic gusset I dislike unfortunately having already worn them, had I seen these in a shop I would not have purchased them.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Warner

customer_reviews.title: Love Salomon shoes
customer_reviews.text: Had bought Adidas proved to be useless as not water proof. Reverted to Salomon as have had before, comfortable and water proof( correction 3rd Dec) they took in water had to return awaiting delivery by Amazon, Amazon are great sent out a replacement pair confident these will be waterproof!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin D

customer_reviews.title: Quality footwear
customer_reviews.text: Package arrived on time. Shoes are excellent quality which is to be expected from Salomon. They are comfortable warm and totally waterproof. They also look good too which a lot of footwear of this type doesn't. Five stars
customer_reviews.author: Graeme walton

customer_reviews.title: half a Size up to what you would normally wear
customer_reviews.text: Salomon shoes are usually half a size smaller, so when buying make sure you buy a half size up to what you are normally.
customer_reviews.author: David Brady

customer_reviews.title: Order
customer_reviews.text: Hasn’t been tested in heavy rainfall but so far so good
customer_reviews.author: Sid

product_meta.title: SALOMON Men's Xa Pro 3D V8 GTX Trail Running Shoe
product_meta.description: Enjoy a lighter version of the classic XA Pro 3D The XA PRO 3D v8 is an icon that will accompany you in your adventures on all terrains. Play steady and long. - LIGHTNESS – Enjoy a lightweight shoe (370 g) for your daily workout. - WATERPROOF - Waterproof Gore-Tex lining to keep your feet dry at all times. - COMFORT– Energy Cell padded midsole and Ortholite insole ensure maximum comfort all day long. - QUICK AND SAFE LACE ADJUSTMENT - The Quicklace system allows you to tighten the laces quickly and easily, without knots! - FIT MANAGEMENT - The Sensifit system cradles the foot perfectly, offering a secure and snug fit. - SOLE - The Contagrip premium sole is made from light, resistant rubber that offers grip and resistance to ensure a safe run on wet surfaces. - STABILITY - Increased lateral stability thanks to the 3D Chassis.
feature_bullets: Iconic fit: now 20g lighter, the shoe features a seamed upper and thinner, softer materials for the perfect balance between comfort and protection
Cushioned stability: The new geometry of 3D chassis provides just the right amount of stability and comfort for a more secure ride
Optimum grip & weather protection: full premium wet traction grip and a fully waterproof gore-tex membrane mean you can ignore the wet and concentrate on the trail ahead
